conversation.message: That is an excellent and very important question, Parent_A. We place a high emphasis on smooth transitions. To ensure continuity, our staff from both the incoming and outgoing rooms collaborate closely. We implement a staggered transition schedule where children make short, supervised visits to their new classroom over several weeks to familiarize themselves with the environment and the new teaching team. Furthermore, our core educational philosophy remains consistent across all age groups, meaning the approach to play-based learning and emotional development is maintained, simply adjusted for developmental stages. This ensures that while the environment changes, the foundational support and expectations remain predictable. We are very eager to continue this conversation!
